name: @carbonvoice/cv-mcp-server
description: Server implementation for integrating with Carbon Voice's API, providing tools and endpoints for voice messaging, conversations, and workspace management through MCP (Model Context Protocol)
author: Carbon Voice

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && tsc && shx chmod +x dist/*.js
scripts.debug: dotenv -e .env -- nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "node --loader ts-node/esm" src/server.ts
scripts.debug:stdio: dotenv -e .env -- nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "node --loader ts-node/esm" src/stdio.ts
scripts.auto:build: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec npm run build
scripts.pregenerate:api: tsc src/utils/zod-transformer.ts --outDir dist/utils && mv dist/utils/zod-transformer.js dist/utils/zod-transformer.cjs
